caption.p: Mean variable importance for Haloxylon ammodendron (a), Anabasis aphylla (b), Calligonum mongolicum (c), and Populus euphratica (d). ISO, Isothermality; MAT, Mean Annual Temperature; MDR, Mean Diurnal Range; MTCM, Min Temperature of Coldest Month; PCQ, Precipitation of Coldest Quarter; PWM, Precipitation of Wettest Month
